tha-ap97:1.4_0: I've taken the name of the Buddha.
tha-ap97:2.1_0: My goblins grief for a month,
tha-ap97:3.4_0: at the fore of the mendicant Saṅgha,
tha-ap97:4.1_0: I paid homage at the teacher’s feet,
tha-ap97:4.4_0: like a colorful crown of flowers.
tha-ap97:5.1_0: make an end of the Buddha,
tha-ap97:5.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap97:6.3_0: wrapped in the host of gods,
tha-ap97:7.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap97:8.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Mandiya.
tha-ap97:9.1_0: The fifth kind of fragrance is the fifth kind of senior.
